pr_title: fix: Add translation for formName property

timeline.message: fix: Add translation for formName property

timeline.bodyText: I think this might be okay. One issue is that most nameable objects do not have this property and then we end up with a lot of objects with an non-mapped (non-persisted) property which is not in use, which is confusing for users of the model. Thoughts?
timeline.author: larshelge
